titleStmt.title: The Intreigues of the French King at Constantinople to embroil Christendom discovered in several dispatches past betwixt him and the late Grand Seignior, Grand Vizier and Count Teckily : all of them found among that Count's papers seiz'd in December last : with some reflections upon them.
titleStmt.author: Louis XIV, King of France, 1638-1715.
Mehmed IV, Sultan of the Turks, 1642-1693.
Kara Mustafa Paşa, Merzifonlu, 1634-1683.
Thököly, Imre, gróf, 1657-1705.

notesStmt.note: "None of them being hitherto seen in English."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
